content: मुहुस् {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Often, constantly, repeatedly, frequently; ग्रीवाभगाभिरामं मुहुरनुपतति स्यंदने दत्तदृष्टिः <ls>Ś. 1. 7</ls>, <ls n="Ś.">2. 6</ls>; generally repeated in this sense; मुहुर्मुहुः over and over again, often and often; गुरुणा सन्निधानेऽपि कः कूजति मुहुर्मुहुः. {@--2@} For a time or moment, awhile; <ls>Me. 105</ls>; generally used with successive clauses in the sense of ‘now now’, ‘at one time-at another time’; मुहुरुत्पतते बाला मुहुः पतति विह्वला . मुहुरालीयते भीता मुहुः क्रोशति रोदिति .. <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls>; <ls>Mu. 5. 3</ls>; मुहुर्तुहुः ‘again and again, repeatedly.’
